name: Afterlife Antics
description:
(The start screen for this game only works in fullscreen mode, sorry!)

Guide your little ghost through perilous caves and past dangerous enemies!

Rules:

-Devour bullets that match your mask's color!

-Avoid Enemies, darkness, and bullets of a different color

-Collect points through devouring bullets and completing levels!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

A: Turn Red

S: Turn Green

D: turn Blue

This game was made by:

Justin Muir - Art

Joshua Van Gaalen - Coding

Julia Merriam - Level Design

(This game was made for the Gamedev.tv 2022 game jam! It's not quite done yet - we'll continue to work on it and add new levels and content in the coming weeks.)
